title: HPI Spencer
content: Greta Griswana presents for follow-up with persistent thumb pain despite improvement in forearm pain. The pain is described as severe and localized to the right upper extremity, specifically at the trapeziometacarpal joint. She denies any trauma or acute injury. No mention of systemic symptoms. No other joints involved.
